source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Cartooning Basics
items.headline: A Beginner's Guide to Creating Comics Art + Characters
objectives_summary: Cartooning your own characters
Effective page layout for comics
How to tell a simple story in a minimal amount of space

items.title: Watercolor Painting | Secrets of a Free Flowing Watercolour.

visible_instructors.job_title: I am a Watercolorist and Art Instructor.
visible_instructors.title: Arie Swanepoel
visible_instructors.name: Arie

items.headline: I believe this course will assist you in creating free flowing watercolours and improve your painting skills.
objectives_summary: What is important in creating free flowing watercolours.
The secrets to creating loose watercolours.
You will do valuable exercises to improve your skills in creating free flowing watercolours.

items.title: Master DARK WASHES painting a dramatic watercolor easily.

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A

items.headline: Learn as you watch me paint this dramatic watercolor. Easy to follow, full of techniques challenges & rewards. Fun too
objectives_summary: How to plan a watercolour painting with confidence
Learn how to identify possible problem areas and solve them in advance
Fully understand the need for practice

items.title: Draw Anime Faces
items.headline: Learn the basics of drawing hair, eyes, and Anime faces in a short time period
objectives_summary: Draw anime hair
Draw anime eyes
Draw anime faces

items.title: Learn 6 easy rock watercolor techniques
items.headline: Exploring Watercolor rocks - Create 6 Simple Demo's to bring your Landscape or Seascapes to Life.
objectives_summary: This course is for all levels of watercolorist or crafty/creative folks looking to create. You will be able to achieve 6 different ways to create rocks.
This is a basic short and simple course filled with short sections on creating rocks using different techniques.
Learn a wet in wet style, learning how to easily blend your watercolor.

items.title: Watercolor Expression. Tulips Variations. (English)
items.headline: Four different pictures with special watercolor effects based on the character of the watercolor paper.
objectives_summary: Different paper – different pictures. Tulips composition from a different art perspective.

items.title: Southampton Sailing painting
items.headline: Learn how to paint a watercolor of a sailboat leaving harbour with a dramatic sky and water.
objectives_summary: Students will review common and unusual techniques in watercolours.
Students will learn an easy way to transfer any image onto a watercolour paper.
Are you having a difficult time painting moving water?  Turn your painting upside down, begin with darker values and use less paint as you approach the horizon.

items.title: Brush Calligraphy for beginners

visible_instructors.job_title: Calligrapher at Me with a Pencil
visible_instructors.title: Chetna Morkhade
visible_instructors.name: Chetna

items.headline: Learn brush calligraphy and  how to give a modern touch (Bouncy style) to your letters.
objectives_summary: My course Brush Calligraphy is perfect for beginners, the art of brush calligraphy with a step-by-step process, from how to hold the brush pen to combine the alphabets and write letters. This course simplifies the art in the most basic and simple explanation put together for the person who has never experienced any art in their life.
Basic Brush lettering.
Creating modern brush lettering / calligraphy.

items.title: Paint a Detailed Magical Horse with Alcohol Inks on Yupo
items.headline: Intermediate Alcohol Ink Course - Create a magical Horse painting using Alcohol Inks on Yupo
objectives_summary: Make this beautiful painting, using Yupo and Alcohol Inks to hang in their own home or to give as a gift!
Learn different techniques, such as wet in wet painting and more controlled strokes with Alcohol Ink.
Interactive community where you can upload your finished art work or art in progress for feedback and questions from both instructor and fellow students!

items.title: How to DRAW and PAINT a watercolor portrait,from the START.

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor
visible_instructors.title: David Walker
visible_instructors.name: David

items.headline: Step by step guide how to draw and paint portraits in pencil and watercolor with an expert watercolor portraiture artist
objectives_summary: All my tried and tested techniques learned over 35 years of professional painting.
How to take a suitable photograph for a portrait painting
how to use your photograph to make a beautiful portrait in pencil or watercolor

items.title: Find The Perfect Niche for your Creative Business

visible_instructors.job_title: Artist, Creative Coach, and Founder of Artist Myth
visible_instructors.title: Mike Roy
visible_instructors.name: Mike

items.headline: Unleash your creativity! Learn how to do artistic work that is custom tailored to your passions, talents, and market.
objectives_summary: Employ some mindsets that are essential for creative success
Relax and learn to embrace the unique joys of being an artist
Effectively strategize ways to further their creative business

items.title: Acrylic Pouring Quick Start
items.headline: Get huge cell-like effects without wasting anymore time and supplies!
objectives_summary: Flip Cup Quick Start
4Tilt Cell Method to get huge cells
Getting the right consistency

items.title: Turn Unused Palette Paint into Coral Sculptures
items.headline: Easily Make a 3D Pipe Coral Acrylic Painting and Save Paint
objectives_summary: Be brilliant & use up layers of paintskins or learn how to make new ones from scratch
Accomplish forming the paintskins into amazing pipe corals of beauty
Know what glue is archival for paintings

items.title: Oil Painting For Beginners, Use Layers In Your Oil Painting
items.headline: Complete Your Own Oil Painting Using Basic Skills And Layering And Create An Oil Painting To Be Proud Of.
objectives_summary: Be Able To Complete Your Own Oil Painting.
Understand The Basics Of How The Process Is Created In Putting An Oil Painting Together.
Be More Comfortable When Practising Oil Painting.

items.title: How to Paint Figures and People with Watercolor
items.headline: Learn Unique Techniques to Paint People & Figures using Watercolor. 2 Courses for the price of 1!
objectives_summary: Have 2 completed a Paintings
Apply new watercolor techniques to their own work
Understand building colours and layers with watercolor

items.title: Paint like the masters  -  Picasso
items.headline: An easy and fun class to start painting abstracts
objectives_summary: The students will be able to create their own Picasso-like painting.
The students will know a lot about Picasso.
The students will know more about colour.
